ygData.subject: Skull+Totem Staff combination
ygData.msgSnippet: Which skull do you combine?  The Jynn Thra one (can t remember the exact name)?  Any idea on how much it sells for? And yes, the stats on that skull are +20
ygData.messageBody:
Which skull do you combine? The Jynn'Thra one (can't remember the exact
name)? Any idea on how much it sells for?

And yes, the stats on that skull are +20 mana, +3 SV magic.

> ----------
> From: Jason Shy[SMTP:demur@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:19 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] a bit off topc but maybe not...
>
> From: "Jason Shy" <demur@...>
>
> No I have to disagree, ever seen the priest of discord infront of the
> castle
> in Rivervale. .. perfect example of how it looked. In beta you could
> combine them by clicking on the staff and then the skull and it was that
> easy. . .but they changed it. Also the name of the staff when it is
> combined is The Sacred Runed Staff.
>
> Demur
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Valacian <abryson@...>
> To: 'EQ_spell_research@onelist.com' <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, May 13, 1999 2:11 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] a bit off topc but maybe not...
>
>
> That is a Myth. You cannot combine a Runed Totem Staff and a Skull. The
> skull can be placed in your 2nd hand if you are not using a 2h weapon.
> This
> will increase your mana by 20 and SV by 3 I belive..
>
> Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Aura Dracul [SMTP:auradracul@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 3:00 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] a bit off topc but maybe not...
>
> From: "Aura Dracul" <auradracul@...>
>
> Any of you spellcasters out there know what skull, you need to combine
> with
> a Ruined totem staff...and what NPC combines them for you?
>
> Sorry its a bit off topic..but I think that it's important to anyone who
> has
> a runined totem staf..it makes em even better!...allthough, how better is
> yet to be seen.
>
> Auraelle
> E'ci Server
